statements: SELECT * FROM robot_calibration_data;
SELECT calibration_date, calibration_value FROM robot_calibration_data WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM robot_calibration_data WHERE calibration_value > 100;
SELECT adjustment_description, calibration_value, calibration_date FROM robot_calibration_data ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT robot_id, AVG(calibration_value) as avg_calibration_value FROM robot_calibration_data GROUP BY robot_id;
SELECT * FROM robot_calibration_data WHERE robot_id = 1 ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT robot_id, calibration_value FROM robot_calibration_data WHERE calibration_value > 10 ORDER BY calibration_value ASC;
SELECT robot_id, calibration_date FROM robot_calibration_data WHERE calibration_value BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY calibration_date ASC;
SELECT robot_id, adjustment_description FROM robot_calibration_data WHERE adjustment_description LIKE '%fine%' ORDER BY robot_id ASC, calibration_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(calibration_value) AS avg_calibration_value FROM robot_calibration_data;
SELECT * FROM Robot_Calibration_Data;
SELECT robot_id, calibration_date FROM Robot_Calibration_Data WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT id, calibration_date, robot_id FROM Robot_Calibration_Data ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Robot_Adjustments WHERE adjustment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT adjustment_details FROM Robot_Adjustments WHERE robot_id = 2 ORDER BY adjustment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Robot_Calibration_Data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT calibration_date, calibration_values FROM Robot_Calibration_Data WHERE robot_id = 10 ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT robot_id, adjustment_date, adjustment_details FROM Robot_Adjustments WHERE robot_id = 5 AND adjustment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, robot_id, JSON_EXTRACT(calibration_values,'$.parameter1') AS parameter1_value FROM Robot_Calibration_Data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_calibrations, robot_id FROM Robot_Calibration_Data GROUP BY robot_id HAVING total_calibrations > 3 ORDER BY total_calibrations DESC, robot_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM robot_calibration_data;
SELECT robot_id, calibration_date FROM robot_calibration_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT robot_id, calibration_data FROM robot_calibration_data ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT id, robot_id, adjustment_date, adjustment_details FROM robot_adjustments WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer, year_acquired FROM robot_list WHERE year_acquired > 2010;
SELECT * FROM robot_calibration_data WHERE calibration_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer FROM robot_list WHERE year_acquired BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT id, adjustment_date, adjustment_details FROM robot_adjustments ORDER BY adjustment_date ASC;
SELECT calibration_data->>'calibration_type' AS calibration_type, COUNT(*) AS calibration_count FROM robot_calibration_data GROUP BY calibration_type;
SELECT robot_id, MAX(calibration_date) AS last_calibration_date FROM robot_calibration_data GROUP BY robot_id;
SELECT * FROM RobotCalibrationData;
SELECT robot_id, calibration_date FROM RobotCalibrationData ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT robot_id, calibration_value FROM RobotCalibrationData WHERE calibration_value > 0.5;
SELECT robot_id, calibration_date, calibration_time FROM RobotCalibrationData WHERE calibration_date = '2021-09-15';
SELECT robot_id, calibration_value FROM RobotCalibrationData WHERE calibration_value BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7;
SELECT robot_id, calibration_date, calibration_value FROM RobotCalibrationData;
SELECT * FROM RobotAdjustments WHERE adjustment_value > 10 ORDER BY adjustment_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, robot_id, log_message FROM RobotLog WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT robot_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM RobotSettings WHERE setting_name = 'temperature' AND setting_value = 'high';
SELECT log_id, robot_id, log_message FROM RobotLog WHERE robot_id = 3 ORDER BY log_date ASC, log_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM robot_data WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT name, model FROM robot WHERE manufacturer = 'Company A';
SELECT technician, success FROM calibration_logs WHERE success = true;
SELECT adjustment_type, value FROM adjustment_logs WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM technicians WHERE specialization = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM robot_data ORDER BY calibration_date DESC, adjustment_1 ASC, adjustment_2 DESC;
SELECT robot_id, AVG(adjustment_1) AS avg_adjustment_1, COUNT(*) FROM robot_data GROUP BY robot_id HAVING AVG(adjustment_1) > 0;

SELECT robot.name AS robot_name, adjustment_logs.adjustment_type, calibration_logs.technician FROM robot JOIN calibration_logs ON robot.id = calibration_logs.robot_id JOIN adjustment_logs ON robot.id = adjustment_logs.robot_id WHERE technician='Alice' AND calibration_logs.success = true;

SELECT robot.name, manufacturer, COUNT(calibration_logs.log_id) AS total_calibrations FROM robot LEFT JOIN calibration_logs ON robot.id = calibration_logs.robot_id GROUP BY robot.name, manufacturer ORDER BY total_calibrations DESC;

SELECT adjustment_logs.date, technicians.name AS technician_name, technicians.specialization FROM adjustment_logs JOIN technicians ON adjustment_logs.adjustment_type = technicians.specialization WHERE adjustment_type='calibration' ORDER BY adjustment_logs.date DESC;
